Caster Level Bonus: +10 base class level for spells known and spells/dy
Enhanced Specialization: Additional opposition school
Intelligence Wizard Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level W1, W2, W3
School Specialization (Enchantment): Extra Enchantment spell/dy each spell level
Tattoo Focus: +1 DC and caster level vs. resistance w/specialization school spells
Circle Leader: 1 hr ritual w/2-5 other members raises caster level, gives metamagic feats
Craft Rod: Create magic rod
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Great Circle Leader: Lead magic circle w/9 other members
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
School Opposition (Conjuration): Cannot learn or cast Conjuration spells
School Opposition (Illusion): Cannot learn or cast Illusion spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Scribe Tattoo: Induct novices into circle
Spell Power: +5 spell DC and resistance checks
Notes
Familiar: Rat "Muthheis"
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Share Spells; Speak With Master

Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage

Share Spells: R5' Master share self spell w/companion
